response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premier product. This unique item holds significant value to us at $1,500,000, but I am extending this exclusive offer to you for a special consideration.

To make this deal irresistible, I propose to sell it to you for $1,350,000. This represents a substantial saving of $150,000 compared to its intrinsic value and offers you an incredible return on investment given its worth to you at $1,500,000.

Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and aligns with your financial planning. I am confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing unparalleled benefits and opportunities.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
